titleInfo.title: Letter, Jacob Rowland in Knoxville, Tenn. to Miss Olive M. Rowland in Willoughby, Ohio, 1865 January 26

mods.abstract: This letter, dated January 26, 1865, from Union soldier Jacob Rowland to his sister, Olive in Willoughby, Ohio, is sent from Knoxville, Tenn., where Rowland reports of "...quiet times here in Knoxville just now occasionally review as inspection we moved our camp last Tuesday. We were on the south side of the river about 1 1/2 miles from the city. Now we are quartered inside of the breast works right in the suburbs..."

subject.topic: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Regimental histories

United United States. Army. Ohio Cavalry Regiment, 2nd (1861-1865). Company M
